item.title: 36 headmasters in Gadwal face action over poor attendance via FRS
item.description:
<![CDATA[36 headmasters in Gadwal face action over poor attendance via FRS
The Jogulamba Gadwal DEO issued show-cause notices to 36 school headmasters for failing to record student attendance via the FRS app. While 36 schools had under 40 per cent attendance, five didnâ€™t update records at all. Disciplinary action may follow
By Telangana Today Published Date - 11 July 2025, 09:02 PM
The Jogulamba Gadwal DEO issued show-cause notices to 36 school headmasters for failing to record student attendance via ...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
